channel.title: Comments on: BOLD 2003: Development and the Internet
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: David Brake
item.dc:creator: David Brake
item.description: I'm there, and I am finding the background information being given out really handy. Can't say I think much of the way that the websites themselves are organized, though.
item.content:encoded: I’m there, and I am finding the background information being given out really handy. Can’t say I think much of the way that the websites themselves are organized, though.

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description: Thanks for posting this. This is perfect for the work I'm doing at the moment. I really appreciate it.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for posting this. This is perfect for the work I’m doing at the moment. I really appreciate it.

item.title: By: Oswald Hanciles
item.dc:creator: Oswald Hanciles
item.description: What is this all about? I am from Africa, in Sierra Leone. I am the Assistant Commissioner, Public Affairs and Tax Education, National Revenue Authority here. I want to be part of your programme. How do I link up. Oswald Hanciles
item.content:encoded:
What is this all about?
I am from Africa, in Sierra Leone. I am the Assistant Commissioner, Public Affairs and Tax Education, National Revenue Authority here. I want to be part of your programme. How do I link up.
Oswald Hanciles
